page.title: 15CHURCHES IN RAMSGATE
page.content: In Ramsgate there are many churches most of which are Church of England .St.Lawrence unlike most other churches in the area has a tower and was built by monks from Minster in 1062.Normally there is a congregation of 120-150 on Sundays with 24 services weekly.St.George's is the largest church in Thanet with an imposing spire and very large clockface.The congregation of 90-120 is small for its size but it is in the middle of town.St.Luke's and Christchurch are the other 2 parishes.The main Catholic church of St.Ethelbert's is small but has the largest congregation(240 on Sundays).The mass is enacted 9 times weekly.Other churches include Pentecostal,Methodist and the Salvation Army.The only synagogue in Thanet is used by the few Jews in Ramsgate on the Sabbath(Saturday).
